class.name: CATBoundaryIterator
class.abstract: Class that defines the iterator on the cells that bound a given cell.

constructor.name: CATBoundaryIterator
constructor.abstract: Constructs an iterator on the bounding cells.

method.name: Duplicate
method.abstract: Duplicates <tt>this</tt> iterator.

method.name: GetElement
method.abstract: Returns the cell which bounding cells are asked for.

method.name: Next
method.abstract: Skips to the next cell of <tt>this</tt> iterator.

method.name: Next
method.abstract: Skips to the next bounding cell of a face.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator at the first cell.

method.name: SetElement
method.abstract: Defines the cell which boundary are asked for.

class.name: CATBoundedCellsIterator
class.abstract: Class defining an iterator that scans the cells bounded by a cell belonging to a specified Body.

method.name: Duplicate
method.abstract: Duplicates <tt>this</tt> iterator.

method.name: GetBody
method.abstract: Returns the body inside which the search is done.

method.name: GetElement
method.abstract: Returns the cell around which the search is done.

method.name: Next
method.abstract: Skips to the next bounded cell.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: Initializes <tt>this</tt> iterator to the first cell.

method.name: SetElement
method.abstract: Defines the context of <tt>this</tt> iterator.

class.name: CATCGMTessEdgeIter
class.abstract: Class that outputs the point tessellation numbers corresponding to the the points on a given edge.

method.name: GetEdgeNbPts
method.abstract: Returns the number of tesselation points for the edge relative to an adjacent face.

method.name: GetEdgeNuPts
method.abstract: Returns the tessellation point numbers for the edge relative to an adjacent face.

method.name: GetEdgeW
method.abstract: Returns the tessellation point parameters for the edge relative to an adjacent face.

method.name: GetFace
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to an adjacent face.

method.name: GetPCurve
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to a PCurve.

method.name: GetSameSens
method.abstract: Returns a CATBoolean is TRUE if the tessellation point numbers for the edge and the Edge are traveling throughtthe same sense.

class.name: CATCGMTessFanIter
class.abstract: Class defining the iterator on the fans resulting from a Tessellation operator.

method.name: GetFanAllNuPts
method.abstract: Globally retrieves the points ranks for all the fans.

method.name: GetFanNbPts
method.abstract: FROM CATIA V5R17 Returns the number of points of the current fan.

method.name: GetFanNuPts
method.abstract: Retrieves the points ranks (as int) defining the current fan.

method.name: GetFanNuPts
method.abstract: Retrieves the points ranks (as CATLONG32) defining the current fan.

method.name: GetNbFan
method.abstract: Returns the number of fans.

method.name: GoToNext
method.abstract: Skips to the next fan.

method.name: IsExhausted
method.abstract: Tests whether the list is completed.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: Resets the iterator to the beginning.

class.name: CATCGMTessPointIter
class.abstract: Class defining the iterator on the points resulting from a Tessellation operator.

method.name: GetNbPoint
method.abstract: Returns the number of computed points.

method.name: GetPointNor
method.abstract: Retrieves a pointer to the normal at the current point.

method.name: GetPointNorAll
method.abstract: Globally retrieves the normal at each point.

method.name: GetPointNu
method.abstract: Returns the rank of the current point.

method.name: GetPointUv
method.abstract: Returns the parameters of the current point (in case of a face or a surface).

method.name: GetPointUvAll
method.abstract: Globally retrieves the parameters of all the points (in case of a face or a surface).

method.name: GetPointXyz
method.abstract: Returns the Cartesian coordinates of the current point.

method.name: GetPointXyzAll
method.abstract: Globally retrieves the Cartesian coordinates of all the points.

method.name: GoToNext
method.abstract: Skips to the next point.

method.name: IsExhausted
method.abstract: Tests whether the list is completed.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: Resets the iterator to the beginning.

method.name: GetPointNor

method.name: GetPointUv
method.abstract: Returns the parameters of the current point (in case of a face or a surface).

method.name: GetPointXyz
method.abstract: Returns the Cartesian coordinates of the current point.

method.name: GoToNext
method.abstract: Skips to the next point.

method.name: IsExhausted
method.abstract: Tests whether the list is completed.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: Resets the iterator to the beginning.

class.name: CATCGMTessVertexIter
class.abstract: Class that outputs the point tessellation numbers corresponding to the the points on a given vertex.

method.name: GetFace
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the current face.

method.name: GetVertexAllNuPts

class.name: CATVertexIterator

class.name: CATCell
class.abstract: Interface representing a topological cell.

method.name: GetResult

method.name: ImposeParametrization

method.name: KnotRankToKnotValue

method.name: SetDegree

method.name: SetMultiplicity

class.name: CATICGMNurbsSurfaceTools

method.name: GetResult

method.name: ImposeParametrizations
method.abstract: Imposes the parameterization of another surface This method deforms the surface.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetDegrees

method.name: USetMultiplicity

method.abstract: Modifies the knot vector along U.

method.name: VImposeParametrization

method.name: VInvert

class.name: CATICGMPositionPtFaceOperator
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that tests the position of a 2D point with respect to a face.

method.name: GetOneResult
method.abstract: Returns the result of the test in case of a point.

method.name: GetResults
method.abstract: Returns the result of the test in case of an array of points.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetSurParam
method.abstract: Defines another point to test.

method.name: SetSurParams
method.abstract: Defines another array of points to test.

method.name: SetToleranceOnBoundary
method.abstract: Defines the tolerance for a point to be on the face boundary.

class.name: CATICGMPositionPtVolOperator
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that tests the position of a 3D point with respect to a volume.

method.name: GetLocationResult
method.abstract: Returns the 3D point location.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

class.name: CATICGMProjectionCrvSur
class.abstract: Class defining the operator of projection of a CATCurve onto a CATSurface.

method.name: BeginningCurve
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the solution curves of <tt>this</tt> CATICGMProjectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: BeginningPoint
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the resulting points.

method.name: GetCartesianPoint
method.abstract: Creates the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATICGMProjectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: GetCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution curve.

method.name: GetDistance
method.abstract: Returns the maximum orthogonal distance between the CATCurve and the CATSurface.

method.name: GetLimitsOnCurve
method.abstract: Maps the limitations of the next solution curve on the original curve.

method.name: GetLimitsOnCurve
method.abstract: Maps the limitations of the next solution curve on the original curve.

method.name: GetLimitsOnProjection
method.abstract: Retrieves the limitations of the next resulting curve.

method.name: GetLimitsOnProjection
method.abstract: Retrieves the limitations of the next resulting curve.

method.name: GetLimitsOnSurface
method.abstract: Retrieves the limits of the next resulting curve on the surface.

method.name: GetMappingParam
method.abstract: Maps a parameter on the curve to project to a parameter on the projection.

method.name: GetNumberOfCurves
method.abstract: Returns the number of solution curves resulting of <tt>this</tt> CATICGMProjectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: GetNumberOfPoints
method.abstract: Returns the number of solution points of <tt>this</tt> CATICGMProjectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: GetPCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution curve as a curve on surface.

method.name: GetPointOnSurface
method.abstract: Creates the next solution as a point on surface.

method.name: IsComplete
method.abstract: Tests whether the curve is entirely projected.

method.name: IsCompletelyOnSurface
method.abstract: Tests whether the curve is entirely lying on the surfae.

method.name: IsPartial
method.abstract: Tests whether the curve is partially projected.

method.name: IsPartiallyOnSurface
method.abstract: Tests whether the curve is partially lying on the surfae.

method.name: NextCurve
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution curve of <tt>this</tt> CATICGMProjectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: NextPoint
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATICGMProjectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: SetClosestProjection
method.abstract: Asks for the closest projection solution (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetCurve
method.abstract: Asks for the projection of a new CATCurve (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetCuspCut
method.abstract: Asks for cusp cut setting (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetLayDown
method.abstract: Sets the "LayDown" mode.

method.name: SetLimits
method.abstract: Modifies the curve domain to take into account for <tt>this</tt> CATICGMIntersectionCrvSur operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetLimits
method.abstract: Modifies the surface domain to take into account for <tt>this</tt> CATICGMIntersectionCrvSur operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetMaximalDistance
method.abstract: Set the maximal distance between a pint and its projected (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetNoClosedProjection
method.abstract: Asks for the projection solution not closed (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetSurface
method.abstract: Asks for the projection on a new CATSurface (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: UnSetClosestProjection
method.abstract: Asks for the all the solutions (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

class.name: CATICGMProjectionPtCrv
class.abstract: Class defining the operator of projection of a CATPoint onto a CATCurve.

method.name: BeginningPoint
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the resulting points.

method.name: GetCartesianPoint
method.abstract: Creates the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATICGMProjectionPtCrv operator.

method.name: GetDistance
method.abstract: Returns the maximum orthogonal distance between the CATCurve and the CATPoint.

method.name: GetNumberOfPoints
method.abstract: Returns the number of solution points of <tt>this</tt> CATICGMProjectionPtCrv operator.

method.name: GetParam
method.abstract: Returns the parameter on the curve of the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATICGMProjectionPtCrv operator.

method.name: GetPointOnCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution as a point on curve of <tt>this</tt> CATICGMProjectionPtCrv operator.

method.name: NextPoint
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATICGMProjectionPtCrv operator.

method.name: SetLimits
method.abstract: Modifies the curve domain to take into account for <tt>this</tt> CATICGMIntersectionCrvSur operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetPoint
method.abstract: Defines a new point to project (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

class.name: CATICGMProjectionPtSur
class.abstract: Class defining the operator of projection of a CATPoint onto a CATSurface.

method.name: BeginningPoint
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the resulting points.

method.name: GetCartesianPoint
method.abstract: Creates the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATICGMProjectionPtSur operator.

method.name: GetDistance
method.abstract: Returns the distance between the CATPoint and its Projection on the CATSurface.

method.name: GetNumberOfPoints
method.abstract: Returns the number of solution points of <tt>this</tt> CATICGMProjectionPtSur operator.

method.name: GetParam
method.abstract: Returns the parameter on the surface of the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATICGMProjectionPtSur operator.

method.name: GetPointOnSurface
method.abstract: Creates the next solution as a point on surface.

method.name: NextPoint
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution point of <tt>this</tt> CATICGMProjectionPtSur operator.

method.name: SetPoint
method.abstract: Defines a new point to project (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: UseLimits
method.abstract: Modifies the surface domain to be taken into account for <tt>this</tt> CATICGMProjectionPtSur operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

class.name: CATICGMReflectCurve
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to compute the reflect curves on a surface.

method.name: BeginningCurve
method.abstract: Initializes the iterator of the solution curves of <tt>this</tt> CATICGMProjectionCrvSur operator.

method.name: GetCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution curve.

method.name: GetNumberOfPCurves
method.abstract: Returns the number of solution curves.

method.name: GetPCurve
method.abstract: Creates the next solution curve as a curve on surface.

method.name: NextCurve
method.abstract: Skips to the next solution curve of <tt>this</tt> CATICGMReflectCurve operator.

method.name: SetLimits
method.abstract: Modifies the surface domain to take into account for <tt>this</tt> CATICGMReflectCurve operator (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

class.name: CATICGMSmartBodyDuplicator
class.abstract: Class defining an operator that duplicates the touched cells (and the cells depending on these touched cells) of a body.

method.name: AddInitialBody
method.abstract: Adds another body to compute the impacts of a touched CATTopology.

method.name: AddLogFilter
method.abstract: Adds a new type to be logged inside the journal of <tt>this</tt> duplicator.

method.name: GetDuplicateLyingOn
method.abstract: Returns the lying on link of a duplicated cell.

method.name: GetDuplicatedBody
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the body inside which the duplicated cells are created.

method.name: GetDuplicatedCell
method.abstract: Returns the mapping between a touched cell and its copy.

method.name: GetDuplicatedDomain
method.abstract: Returns the mapping between a touched domain and its copy.

method.name: GetFullDuplication
method.abstract: Returns a value indicating how the edges and vertices are duplicated by <tt>this</tt>.

method.name: GetInitialBodies
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of the bodies that are taken into account by <tt>this</tt> duplicator.

method.name: GetJournal
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the journal of <tt>this</tt> iterator.

method.name: ResetLogFilter
method.abstract: Resets the filter on the cells for the journal.

method.name: SetDuplicateLyingOn
method.abstract: Specifies the lying on link of a duplicated cell.

method.name: SetFullDuplication
method.abstract: Specifies how the edges and vertices are to be duplicated by <tt>this</tt>.

class.name: CATICGMSurTo2DGlobalMapping
class.abstract: Class defining a consistant global mapping between a set of CATSurface and a virtual 2 dimension space.

class.name: CATICGMSurTo2DGlobalPlanarMapping
class.abstract: Class defining the mapping between one set of surfaces and a virtual 2 dimension space defined by an axis.

class.name: CATICGMSurfaceTessellator
class.abstract: Class defining a tessellation operator on surfaces.

method.name: AddSurface
method.abstract: Adds an other surface to <tt>this</tt> CATICGMSurfaceTessellator.

method.name: GetSurface
method.abstract: Retrieves the results associated with a surface.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> CATICGMSurfaceTessellator.

method.name: SetStep
method.abstract: Defines a finite step for <tt>this</tt> CATICGMCurveTessellator.

class.name: CATICGMTopEdgePropagation
class.abstract: Class representing the topological operator which performs an edge propagation on a body.

method.name: GetDiagnoses
method.abstract: Gets the propagation diagnoses at each extremity of the output wire.

method.name: SetBoundaryMode
method.abstract: Defines the boundary propagation mode on shell.

method.name: SetContinuityMode
method.abstract: Defines the continuity propagation mode.

method.name: SetReferenceFace
method.abstract: Defines the face to be used as a reference for the orientation of the resulting wire.

method.name: SetTolerance
method.abstract: Defines the tolerance propagation value for a continuity level.

class.name: CATICGMTopOperator
class.abstract: Abstract class for the topological operators.

method.name: GetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Returns the mode in which the resulting body is created.

method.name: GetInputObjectsForJournal
method.abstract: Returns the input objects used by <tt>this</tt> CATICGMTopOperator to create its journal.

method.name: GetJournal
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the topological journal associated with <tt>this</tt> CATICGMTopOperator.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the resulting body.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the resulting body.

method.name: SetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Defines the state of the resulting body.

class.name: CATICGMTopPolarExtremumOperator
class.abstract: Class defining the operator which computes the polar extremums of a wire body.

method.name: GetResultAngleMax
method.abstract: Returns the point located at the maximum angle.

method.name: GetResultAngleMin
method.abstract: Returns the point located at the minimum angle.

method.name: GetResultRadiusMax
method.abstract: Returns the point located at the maximum radius.

method.name: GetResultRadiusMin
method.abstract: Returns the point located at the minimum radius.

method.name: GetResultListEdges
method.abstract: Returns the list of cells tangent to the initial edges.

class.name: CATICGMTopRelimitByVolume
class.abstract: Operator to trim a shell or a wire by a volume.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Retrieves the trimmed result.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs the operator.

method.name: SetSelectionType
method.abstract: Specifies the portions of the input body to be kept.

class.name: CATLoop
class.abstract: Interface representing a set of connected edges of a face.

method.name: Done
method.abstract: States that <tt>this</tt> CATLoop construction is finished.

class.name: CATLump
class.abstract: Interface representing a topological domain of dimension 3.

class.name: CATShell
class.abstract: Interface representing a set of connected faces of a body or a volume.

method.name: IsClosed
method.abstract: Checks whether <tt>this</tt> shell is closed.

method.name: ReplaceCell
method.abstract: Replaces a CATCell by another in <tt>this</tt> CATDomain.

class.name: CATTopObject
class.abstract: Base interface representing a <tt>CATBody</tt> or a <tt>CATCell</tt>.

method.name: AddDomainWithLocation
method.abstract: Adds a CATDomain to <tt>this</tt> CATTopObject.

method.name: GetDomain
method.abstract: Returns the <tt>iNum</tt>-th CATDomain of <tt>this</tt> CATTopObject.

method.name: GetNbDomains
method.abstract: Returns the number of CATDomains of <tt>this</tt> CATTopObject.

method.name: HasInfiniteGeometry
method.abstract: Test whether <tt>this</tt> CATTopObject can be considered as infinite.

method.name: RemoveDomain
method.abstract: Removes a CATDomain from <tt>this</tt> CATTopObject.

class.name: CATTopology
class.abstract: Base interface of the cell-complexes, including non manifold, non connected complexes, mixing dimensions of topological cells.

method.name: GetAllCells
method.abstract: Returns all the CATCells of a prescribed dimension of <tt>this</tt> CATTopology.

method.name: GetAllDomains
method.abstract: Returns all the CATDomains of prescribed low and high dimensions of <tt>this</tt> CATTopology.

method.name: GetCellNumbers
method.abstract: Returns the number of Vertices, Edges, Faces and Volumes of <tt>this</tt> CATTopology.

method.name: IsInside
method.abstract: Tests whether <tt>this</tt> CATTopology is recursively defined as a boundary of another CATTopology.

method.name: IsTouched
method.abstract: Tests whether <tt>this</tt> CATTopology is touched.

method.name: Touch
method.abstract: Declares that <tt>this</tt> CATTopology is touched by an operation inside the context of a given body.

class.name: CATVertex
class.abstract: Interface representing a topological vertex.

method.name: CreateRadialIterator
method.abstract: Creates an iterator on the CATEdge bounded by <tt>this</tt> CATVertex.

method.name: EvalSharpness
method.abstract: Returns the continuity of <tt>this</tt> CATVertex with respect to 2 bounded edges.

method.name: GetGeometryOnEdge
method.abstract: Returns the geometry of <tt>this</tt> CATVertex with respect to a given edge.

method.name: GetParamOnEdgeCurve
method.abstract: Returns the geometry of <tt>this</tt> CATVertex with respect to a given edge as a parameter on a CATEdgeCurve.

method.name: GetPoint
method.abstract: Returns the geometry of <tt>this</tt> CATVertex.

method.name: SetGeometryOnEdge
method.abstract: Sets the geometry of <tt>this</tt> CATVertex with respect to a given edge.

method.name: SetPoint
method.abstract: Sets a the geometry of <tt>this</tt> CATVertex.

method.name: SetSharpness
method.abstract: Defines the continuity of <tt>this</tt> CATVertex with respect to 2 bounded edges.

method.name: UnlinkUselessGeometry
method.abstract: Removes useless components from the CATMacroPoint.

class.name: CATVertexInFace
class.abstract: Interface representing a vertex immersed into a face.

class.name: CATVertexInVolume
class.abstract: Interface representing a vertex immersed into a volume or direcly referenced by a body.

class.name: CATVolume
class.abstract: Interface representing a topological volume.

class.name: CATWire
class.abstract: Interface representing a set connected edges of a body or a volume.

method.name: ChangeClosureVertex
method.abstract: Changes the first vertex of <tt>this</tt> CATWire, if it is closed.

method.name: GetExtremities
method.abstract: Retrieves the extremities of <tt>this</tt> CATWire.

method.name: GetVertex
method.abstract: Retrieves a vertex of <tt>this</tt> CATWire.

method.name: GetVertexRank
method.abstract: Returns the rank of a vertex in <tt>this</tt> CATWire.

method.name: IsClosed
method.abstract: Checks whether the first vertex and the last vertex of <tt>this</tt> CATWire are the same.

struct.name: CATTopSharpness
struct.abstract: Structure representing the geometric properties of an edge.

typedef.name: CATIntersectionOrientation
typedef.abstract: Defines the relative orientation of a curve and a loop.

typedef.name: CATTopSign
typedef.abstract: Defines the orientation of an element vs another element.
